 Stargate Game Announced (no joke)

Hi there, this is my first post for this forum and as was cruising the forum, i noticed the new bit of news wasnt here at all. Those who read PCGAMER magazine (page16) here in the UK will know that a Stargate game is in the works, weither it is SG-1, film or Infinity orientated i don't know. What i do know is that it is a plot-driven RPG made by Epic games, and it is being worked on in coordination with MGM's Stargate effects team, it has multiplayer support and will be officially announced early next year.

Why someone did'nt think of this game before is beyond me because Stargate would make the perfect exploration and shoot em up game when i find out anymore il let you all know.

__________________
